docs.snippet: More poor students are going to college than in the past. And yet the number who graduate is falling even further behind.
As a massive manufacturing exporter, the aerospace giant is particularly vulnerable to retaliation from China, a major customer.

docs.snippet: Corporations and foreign leaders are pressing to meet with White House officials and hiring lawyers and lobbyists to push for exemptions that could be worth billions of dollars in trade.
